title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: (https://www.england.nhs.uk/community-health-services/) Shifting care hospital community one improvements outlined NHS Long Term Plan help ensure meet changing health needs country coming decade. Community health services cover wide range services provide care people birth end life. Community health teams play vital role supporting people complex health care needs live independently home long possible. Services also include health promotion services school health services health visiting services. Many services involve partnership working across health social care teams, made wide variety professionals including GPs, community nurses, allied health professionals, district nurses, mental health nurses, therapists social care workers. Services mainly delivered people’s homes, (includes care homes) also community hospitals, intermediate care facilities, clinics schools. Community health services include: 2 hour rapid crisis response services District nursing Child health services Community occupational therapy Community paediatric clinics Community end life palliative care Community physiotherapy Musculoskeletal therapy Pulmonary cardiac rehabilitation Community podiatry Community speech language therapy Falls prevention services Intermediate care services Specialist nurses (example, diabetes, COPD, heart failure, incontinence, tissue viability) Bed-based community rehabilitation Wheelchair services Health visiting School health services Sexual health services list exhaustive. Different types organisations provide community health services including NHS trusts, community interest companies, social enterprises, local authorities independent providers.
